    • Method Detail

      • dumpIndexSegment

        protected void dumpIndexSegment(IndexSegment seg)
        apply dump() as a structural validation of the tree. note that we have to materialize the leaves in the generated index segment since dump does not materialize a child from its Addr if it is not already resident.

      • testForwardScan

        public static void testForwardScan(IndexSegment seg)
        Test forward leaf scan.

      • testReverseScan

        public static void testReverseScan(IndexSegment seg)
        Test reverse leaf scan. Note: the scan starts with the last leaf in the key order and then proceeds in reverse key order.

      • testMultiBlockIterator

        public static void testMultiBlockIterator(BTree expected,
                          IndexSegment actual)
        Compares the IndexSegmentMultiBlockIterator against the standard BTree iterator.
        Parameters:
        expected - The ground truth BTree.
        actual - The IndexSegment.
